title.rendered: The Best Mobile Phone Deals With 4GB Of Data

content.rendered:
Not everyone wants or needs masses of data. However, having a reasonable amount of data to use on a daily basis is often appreciated. In this instance, there’s a magic number of data to consider, and that’s 4GB.

 Pairing this provision of data with a mobile phone isn’t always easy, but we’ve got a few deals up our sleeves for you. To try and help you find the best possible mobile phones with 4GB of data, we’ll be taking a look at some of the best.

iPhone 8

 The iPhone 8 is still an excellent phone for almost anyone to enjoy. As you probably know, Apple are technological geniuses, and they’ve created phones which still perform well even after the new models have come after them.

 To this end, there’s an iPhone 8 deal available for you. This particular deal has unlimited minutes and texts for you to enjoy, as well as the 4GB of data, all for just £39. Backed up by EE, you’ve got access to all kinds of different extras such as Apple Music to go with it. It’s a good option, plus you get your hands on some stylish Apple tech.

iPhone X

Did we mention that the flagship model of Apple fits into the 4GB of data tier? Oh yeah. The most cutting-edge technology that Apple has available right now is something you can consider for your mobile deal.

 Besides the 4GB of data, you get unlimited texts, minutes and some sweet extras, thanks to Vodafone. While the price is slightly up at £51.50, it’s well worth paying that bit extra for the phone itself. The X is sleek, sophisticated and powerful, and is a phone for the modern man or woman. It’s pretty hard to get something more capable than this, so it’s worth looking into.

 All in all, these are just a handful of the different phone deals we offer that all have the best possible handsets and 4GB of data. They’re perfect for someone on a budget, or someone who doesn’t use all that data and doesn’t see why it’s needed.

There are a lot of different options for you to consider, and it is important to remember that these are just a small handful. There are all kinds of other options out there, and they’re all equally valid. If you take the time to look through all of these deals, then there’s no doubt that you’ll find what it is that you’re looking for and get a great deal.

Samsung Galaxy S9

The first deal that we’re going to be taking a look at is the Samsung Galaxy S9, and one of the deals that are on offer with this.

 You get the 4GB of data that you’re looking for, as well as unlimited texts and minutes for calls, and it’s all available for just £37.50 a month. It’s perfect for people who are looking for a good phone but don’t want to pay masses for either the contract or the data.
